game.welcome: After a fun night at the bar on top of the mountain with your friend Drago, you find yourself inside of a luxurious casino with no memories on how you got there.
game.casino_tour: You confusely look around, until a staff manager approaches you and offers you a tour of the casino. You accept and he guides you through the different rooms.
casino_tour_rooms: The Lobby, a magnificent room full of flashing lights, elegant carpets, and an atmosphere of wealth and mystery.
The Slots Room, a room full of slot machines and excited players.
The Blackjack Room, an elegant room with blackjack tables and focused players.
The Horse Race Room, a room with thrilling races and cheering crowds.
The Poker Room, a dimly lit room with poker tables and serious players.
The Baccarat Room, an elegant room with baccarat tables and stylish players aswell as bets so high you cant comprehend.
The Roulette Room, a glamorous room with a large roulette table in the center.
The VIP Lounge, a room you can only enter if you have enough money to unlock it.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description:
A magnificent room full of flashing lights, elegant carpets, and an atmosphere of wealth and mystery.
The air is filled with the sound of clinking coins and lively players. Portraits of legendary winners, whose stories are almost as famous as the casino itself, adorn the walls.

events.dialogue: Welcome to the casino! Here you can challenge your fate, but be warned, not everyone who enters leaves as a winner.
A mysterious man in a dark suit speaks to you: 'Are you really playing just for fun, or do you want more? True riches await, but the price is steep.'

rooms.name: Slots Room
rooms.description: A room full of slot machines and excited players. The lights of the machines blink hypnotically, and the occasional sound of a jackpot electrifies the room. But not everyone is lucky here ‚Äì the machines have their whims.

game.description: Spin the reels and hope for three matching symbols to win coins.

events.dialogue: The reels spin and a bright tone sounds. You've hit the jackpot! Your winnings are almost too big to count!
The reels stop and you see the familiar symbol of failure. Your coins disappear faster than you can bet them.

rooms.name: Blackjack Room
rooms.description: An elegant room with blackjack tables and focused players. Soft music plays in the background, and the atmosphere is tense as players study their cards. A sense of daring fills the air ‚Äì who will dare to win the game?

game.description: Face the dealer and try to get as close to 21 points as possible without exceeding it.

events.dialogue: The dealer smiles mysteriously and says: 'Are you ready to test your luck? Only the brave survive here.'
You feel the tension in the room rise as you make a high bet. All eyes are on you. Will you triumph or fail?

rooms.name: Horse Race Room
rooms.description: A room with thrilling horse races. The walls are decorated with pictures of famous winners, and the tension is palpable as the races are broadcast. The crowd cheers as the horses are at the starting gate ‚Äì it‚Äôs going to be an exciting race.

game.description: Bet on your favorite horse and experience the thrill of a race. Winning triples your bet!

events.dialogue: The race begins, the horses gallop off. Your heart races ‚Äì did you bet on the right horse?
It was a close race, but your horse has won! You get three times your bet back!

rooms.name: Poker Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit room with poker tables where serious players sit. The atmosphere is tense, every move counts, and the sound of chips being stacked fills the air.

game.description: Test your poker face and bluff your way to victory with the best cards or the strongest nerves.

events.dialogue: You make a big bluff and your heart races as your opponent hesitates. The chips are now yours!
You go all-in. All eyes are on you. It‚Äôs all or nothing!

rooms.name: Baccarat Room
rooms.description: An elegant room with baccarat tables where players in suits and dresses sit. The dealer distributes the cards with professional precision. This is a game of style and strategy.

game.description: Choose between Player, Banker, or Tie and bet on the winner in this fast-paced card game.

events.dialogue: The banker wins with an incredible score. You rejoice over your winnings!
Your bet on the player was successful. You collect your winnings.

rooms.name: Roulette Room
rooms.description: A glamorous room with a large roulette table in the center. Players watch intently as the ball dances on the spinning wheel before landing on a number.

game.description: Bet on a number, color, or row and watch as the ball decides your fate.

events.dialogue: The ball lands on red! Your bet doubles.
The ball lands on zero. A rare outcome, but the reward is huge!

owner.name: Casino Owner
dialogue: Welcome, player. You‚Äôve come far, but this is just the beginning.
You stand at a crossroads: glory and riches or a life of regret. What choice will you make?
Choose your game. I hope your luck holds, for mine is legendary.
You‚Äôve gained fame, but the real test is yet to come. Come to me when you‚Äôre ready to risk it all.

challenge.win_reward: You‚Äôve taken over the casino! It‚Äôs yours, and your fame precedes you.
challenge.lose_penalty: You‚Äôve lost everything. The casino graciously leaves you a few coins to start again.

events.dialogue: The owner looks at you with a sharp gaze. 'It‚Äôs time for you to play against me. Do you have the courage to bet it all and win?'
